mapper.select: select timestampdiff(hour, rent_s_date, now()) from t_rent where rent_seq = #{rent_seq}
select timestampdiff(hour, rent_s_date, #{rent_e_date}) from t_rent where rent_seq = #{rent_seq}

update t_rent set pay_amount = #{pay_amount} where rent_seq = #{rent_seq}

update t_rent set pay_done = #{pay_done} where rent_seq = #{rent_seq}
